item.title: AI-Enhanced Machine Vision Powers the Next Generation of EV Battery Quality Control
item.description: Atlas Copco launches 'Smart Verification with AI' using specialized machine-vision cameras and AI to validate EV battery integrity and safety in real-time.

item.title: How AI at the Edge is Reinventing Manufacturing Quality
item.description: Siemens leverages Arm-based edge AI platforms to embed intelligence directly into production environments, enabling real-time anomaly detection without cloud latency.

item.title: AI-Powered End-of-Line Inspection Redefines Quality Control
item.description: Danube Dynamics and Asp√∂ck Systems utilize IDS industrial cameras and AI to automate complex end-of-line inspections for vehicle multi-chamber lamps.

item.title: Next-Generation Shopfloor CMM Technology: Engineering Solutions for Production Environments
item.description: Ready Metrology introduces shopfloor CMMs featuring fixed portal architecture and full table extraction, bringing laboratory-grade precision directly to production.

item.title: Autodesk Invests $200 Million in World Labs to Advance Physical-World AI
item.description: Autodesk invests $200 million in World Labs to advance physical-world AI for industrial applications.

item.title: Waygate Mentor Zoom Inspection Camera Launched for Enhanced Industrial Inspections
item.description: Waygate Technologies launches Mentor Zoom, a PTZ camera system for enhanced remote visual inspection in industrial environments.

item.title: Function-First Robot To Redefine Factory Automation
item.description: Midea Group launches MIRO U, a function-first industrial robot designed to redefine factory automation efficiency.
